section_title:
14e06 - Contracts between a Federal or District of Columbia agency and
another such agency.
text:
Prime contracts between a
Federal or District of Columbia agency and another such agency are not subject
to the SCA. “Subcontracts” awarded under “prime contracts” between the Small
Business Administration and another Federal agency pursuant to various small
business/minority set-aside programs, such as the “section 8(a)” program, are
covered by the SCA. (See 29 C.F.R. 4.110.)
html: Prime contracts between a Federal or District of Columbia agency and another such agency are not subject to the SCA. “Subcontracts” awarded under “prime contracts” between the Small Business Administration and another Federal agency pursuant to various small business/minority set-aside programs, such as the “section 8(a)” program, are covered by the SCA. (See 29 C.F.R. 4.110.)
